name: Everyday Quick Chole/Chana Masala (Garbanzo Beans Curry)
description: Everyday quick chole/ chana masala (garbanzo beans curry). Simple, healthy and delicious. Vegan and Gluten Free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1 inch ginger chopped ((can be substituted with ginger paste))
3-4 cloves garlic peeled and chopped ((can be substituted with garlic paste))

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, add 3 medium chopped tomatoes, ginger, garlic, fenugreek seeds, lemon juice, 1/4 can garbanzo beans. Blend into a paste and keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: In a blender, add 3 medium chopped tomatoes, ginger, garlic, fenugreek seeds, lemon juice, 1/4 can garbanzo beans. Blend into a paste and keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a pressure cooker, add oil and onions.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pressure cooker, add oil and onions.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook until onions are translucent. Add in the spices, asofetida, chili flakes and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook until onions are translucent. Add in the spices, asofetida, chili flakes and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the blended tomato and cook on medium low, partially covered with occasional stirring until the paste thickens and starts to leave oil (15 minutes)
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the blended tomato and cook on medium low, partially covered with occasional stirring until the paste thickens and starts to leave oil (15 minutes)

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the salt and remaining garbanzo beans and a cup or 2 of water according to how you want the curry.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the salt and remaining garbanzo beans and a cup or 2 of water according to how you want the curry.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot topped with chopped onions, lemon wedges, cilantro and Rotis or Naans!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot topped with chopped onions, lemon wedges, cilantro and Rotis or Naans!

keywords: Indian side dish, vegan curry, vegan side dish
